New Records: Suryakumar Yadav scored the first century of his T20I career at home
Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav's 112 not out off 51 balls, Arshdeep Singh's 3/20, Hardik Pandya's 2/30, Yuzvendra Chahal's 2/30, Umran Malik's 2/31, and Axar Patel's 1/19 were key events in the match
Pre-Game Insights: No specific pre-game insights were mentioned in the article
Post-Match Reflections: No specific post-match reflections were mentioned in the article
Miscellaneous Highlights: India sealed the three-match T20 series 2-1, Hardik Pandya-led India posted a huge 228 for 5, and the target was too much for the visitors, who were bundled out for 137 in 16.4 overs
